actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the requirement of filing certain returns and the tax on unrelated business income shall not apply to certain nonprofit social clubs, domestic fraternal societies, and veterans organizations.

summary.text: Provides that the requirement of filing returns and the tax on unrelated business income shall not apply to specified nonprofit social clubs, domestic fraternal societies, and veterans organizations under the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that the requirement of filing certain returns and the tax on unrelated business income shall not apply to certain nonprofit social clubs, domestic fraternal societies, and veterans organizations.
